title: MacOS Sequoia 15.5 Update Released with Bug Fixes & Security Enhancements
description: MacOS Sequoia 15.5 is now available as a software update for Mac users running the Sequoia operating system. The system software update includes bug fixes and security enhancements, but does not appear to include any new features or other major changes. Additionally, Apple has also released MacOS Ventura 13.7.6 and macOS Sonoma 14.7.6 for Mac, ... Read More
author: Paul Horowitz
excerpt: MacOS Sequoia 15.5 is now available as a software update for Mac users running the Sequoia operating system. The system software update includes bug fixes and security enhancements, but does not ap…
text: MacOS Sequoia 15.5 is now available as a software update for Mac users running the Sequoia operating system. The system software update includes bug fixes and security enhancements, but does not appear to include any new features or other major changes. Additionally, Apple has also released MacOS Ventura 13.7.6 and macOS Sonoma 14.7.6 for Mac, along with iOS 18.5, iPadOS 18.5, iPadOS 17.7.7, watchOS 11.5, tvOS 18.5, and visionOS 2.5. How to Download & Install MacOS Sequoia 15.5 Update Be sure to backup the Mac with Time Machine before beginning the system software update. Go to “System Settings” from the  apple menu Go to “General” and then go to “Software Update” Choose to “Update Now” for “macOS Sequoia 15.5” download and install the update to the Mac The Mac will require a restart to finish installation. If you’re running Sonoma or Ventura, you will find MacOS Ventura 13.7.6 and macOS Sonoma 14.7.6 available instead. Newer versions of MacOS will estimate the time required to complete the installation, but nonetheless updating MacOS can be slow for some users so you will want to have patience and let the update complete. Do not interrupt a system software update in progress. Direct Download macOS Sequoia 15.5 Installer & IPSW File Mac users can download the full installer for MacOS Seqouia 15.5, along with the Sequoia 15.5 IPSW file. These are useful for making bootable installers, virtual machines, updating multiple Macs, archival purposes, and much more, but are generally considered more advanced. MacOS Sequoia 15.5 InstallAssistant.pkg MacOS Sequoia 15.5 IPSW Direct download links for macOS Sonoma 14.7.6 & MacOS Ventura 13.7.6 macOS Sonoma 14.7.6 InstallAssistant.pkg macOS Ventura 13.7.6 InstallAssistant.pkg MacOS Sequoia 15.5 Release Notes Release notes for the MacOS Sequoia 15.5 update contain very little information or specifics: This update includes enhancements, bug fixes, and security updates for your Mac. Some features may not be available for all regions, or on all Apple devices. For information on the security content of Apple software updates, please visit: https://support.apple.com/100100 Separately, you will also find updates for other devices available including iOS 18.5, iPadOS 18.5, watchOS 11.5, tvOS 18.5, visionOS 2.5, along with updates for macOS Sonoma and MacOS Ventura.
html:
MacOS Sequoia 15.5 is now available as a software update for Mac users running the Sequoia operating system. The system software update includes bug fixes and security enhancements, but does not appear to include any new features or other major changes.

Additionally, Apple has also released MacOS Ventura 13.7.6 and macOS Sonoma 14.7.6 for Mac, along with iOS 18.5, iPadOS 18.5, iPadOS 17.7.7, watchOS 11.5, tvOS 18.5, and visionOS 2.5.

How to Download & Install MacOS Sequoia 15.5 Update

Be sure to backup the Mac with Time Machine before beginning the system software update.

  1. Go to “System Settings” from the  apple menu
  2. Go to “General” and then go to “Software Update”
  3. Choose to “Update Now” for “macOS Sequoia 15.5” download and install the update to the Mac

The Mac will require a restart to finish installation.

If you’re running Sonoma or Ventura, you will find MacOS Ventura 13.7.6 and macOS Sonoma 14.7.6 available instead.

Newer versions of MacOS will estimate the time required to complete the installation, but nonetheless updating MacOS can be slow for some users so you will want to have patience and let the update complete. Do not interrupt a system software update in progress.

Direct Download macOS Sequoia 15.5 Installer & IPSW File

Mac users can download the full installer for MacOS Seqouia 15.5, along with the Sequoia 15.5 IPSW file. These are useful for making bootable installers, virtual machines, updating multiple Macs, archival purposes, and much more, but are generally considered more advanced.

  • MacOS Sequoia 15.5 InstallAssistant.pkg
  • MacOS Sequoia 15.5 IPSW

Direct download links for macOS Sonoma 14.7.6 & MacOS Ventura 13.7.6

  • macOS Sonoma 14.7.6 InstallAssistant.pkg
  • macOS Ventura 13.7.6 InstallAssistant.pkg

MacOS Sequoia 15.5 Release Notes

Release notes for the MacOS Sequoia 15.5 update contain very little information or specifics:

This update includes enhancements, bug fixes, and security updates for your Mac.

Some features may not be available for all regions, or on all Apple devices.
For information on the security content of Apple software updates, please visit: https://support.apple.com/100100

Separately, you will also find updates for other devices available including iOS 18.5, iPadOS 18.5, watchOS 11.5, tvOS 18.5, visionOS 2.5, along with updates for macOS Sonoma and MacOS Ventura.
